Packages: 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(MASS)
```


Read in data: 
```{r}
dat <- read_csv("ISSP_OECD2015.csv")
dat

glimpse(dat)
```

Drop rows with missing values, except for ISCO column. (Per PI)
```{r}
dat.dropped <- na.omit(dat)
summary(dat.dropped)

dat.dropped <- na.omit(dat.dropped %>% filter(sector != c("")
                                            #& isco != c("")
                                            & fulltime != c("")
                                            & union != c("")
                                            & relmgmt != c("")
                                            & jobsec != c("")))
summary(dat.dropped)
```

## Multilevel ordinal logistic regression
Perform multilevel ordinal logistic regression using polr() function from MASS package.

Response, y = jobsec.  5 level ordinal response. 


```{r}


fit <- polr(jobsec~ eprc + relmgmt + unemp +ltu + sex + age + sector + fulltime + union, data = dat.dropped)

fit




```
